channel.title: [PI] Pk Point System
channel.description: Hi I have the "pkPoints" token allready in my source But, It doesnt give you them per kill. Now I have looked through numerous website but all are the same and dont show you how to actually implement the Pk Point System. If anyone can help me or redirect me to somewhere Which shows me how that would be great.
